Lyric:
[00:14.149]There is a time when we should heed a certain call
[00:20.579]Cause the world it seems it’s right in this line
[00:27.420]Cause there’s a chance for taking in needing our own lives
[00:34.300]It seems we need nothing at all
[00:41.309]I used to feel that I should give away my heart
[00:48.149]And it shows that fear of needing them
[00:55.499]Then I read the headlines and it said they’re dying there
[01:02.499]And it shows that we must heed instead
[01:08.440]We are the world
[01:11.800]We are the children
[01:15.169]We are the ones who make a brighter day
[01:18.380]So let’s start giving
[01:22.199]But there’s a chance we’re taking
[01:26.149]We’re taking our own lives
[01:29.800]It’s true we’ll make a brighter day just you and me
